ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 06/11/2016 10:14 AM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Shortness of breath. COMPARISON: Chest radiograph dated 06/19/2016. TECHNIQUE: 1 view. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is a new large left-sided pleural effusion with near complete opacification of the left lung. There is a small right-sided pleural effusion. No pneumothorax. Mediastinum: The heart is obscured by the left-sided opacity. Other: None. IMPRESSION: 1. New large left-sided pleural effusion with near complete opacification of the left lung. 2. Small right-sided pleural effusion.
